data.title: The Asteroid Belt Volume 4
data.meta_description:
The Asteroid Belt Volume 4 by Thee Crumb, released 19 August 2016

1. 16 Psyche
2. 36 Atalante
3. 42 Isis
4. 52 Europa
5. 66 Maja
6. 78 Diana
7. 193 Ambrosia
8. 223 Rosa
9. 224 Oceana
10. 228 Agathe
11. 351 Yrsa
12. 448 Natalie
13. 763 Cupido
14. 886 Washingtonia
15. 1043 Beate
16. 1743 Schmidt

Back once again with the fourth volume of this ongoing series of albums named after objects in the Asteroid Belt.
The numbers at the start of each track are sequential numbers, which are assigned to the asteroid once it's orbit is secured - the name often follows much later....
The basic sound of this album is pretty much Ambient, but more than uncommon discordant sounds do pop up, so it may prove a tad disquieting if you're just looking to chill.
Each track has a few notes attached to it regarding it's Astronomical Namesake.
data.text:

If there's anybody who's interested in using any of the tracks I've put up here - for whatever reason - then contact me and we'll see what we can work out... ... more
